abstract: The ad agency will market all parts of the NBC Sports Group, which will soon include Comcast’s sports cable channels.
snippet: The ad agency will market all parts of the NBC Sports Group, which will soon include Comcast’s sports cable channels.
lead_paragraph: 11:33 a.m. | Updated NBC Universal will announce on Monday that John Miller, who led all of NBC’s marketing efforts for 25 years until last summer, is coming out of semi-retirement to set up and head the NBC Sports Agency.

headline.main: An Ad Agency for NBC Sports
